title: Mimir.Knowledge.start
body:
Off to a great start there, my friend. 
Anyway, any scholar worth his salt should have the basic lore regarding his Gods history. 
Before I was killed, I lived for a while with the Vanir Gods, along with another Aesir God such as myself. 
You have to name that God to prove your knowledge.
[[Monrjiall.Knowledge.silence]]

title: Mimir.Knowledge.trial1Complete
body:
No, you should not, but that IS the right answer. 
Hoenir was the other God the Vanir hosted along with me. 
Good job!

[[Monrjiall.Knowledge.otherGod]]

title: Monrjiall.Knowledge.DoneTalking
body:
Oh, yes, you are done talking.

[[Mimir.Knowledge.answer?]]

title: Mimir.Knowledge.answer?
body:
Yes, do you know the answer?

[[Monrjiall.Knowledge.AnswerGoThere]]

title: Monrjiall.Knowledge.AnswerGoThere
body:
Of course, everybody knows that… I just need to… um… check something first.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Knowledge.asked
body:
The one I asked you about earlier. 
That you went and asked Hildr about. 
And even though you did not come up with the answer yourself, you showed resourcefulness when it came to obtain what you didn’t have... 
...which is as valuable as knowledge itself. 
I believe you have passed this test.

[[Monrjiall.Knowledge.test]]

title: Monrjiall.Knowledge.test
body:
What test??

<<set $pz2complete to true>>

<<if $pz2complete is true and $pz3complete is true and $pz4complete is true>>
<<set $allPzComplete to true>>
<<endif>>

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Knowledge.trial1repeat
body:
Who was with me as a guest to the Vanir Gods?

[[Monrjiall.Knowledge.RightEasy]]

title: Monrjiall.Knowledge.RightEasy
body:
Right, easy. I’ll be right back.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]
